FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, cyclonic becoming westerly or southwesterly, 4 to 6, occasionally 3 in south and 7 in north. In north, southerly 5 to 7 at first in east, otherwise westerly or southwesterly 4 to 6, increasing 6 to gale 8 later.
Sea state
In south, moderate, occasionally rough in north. in north, rough or very rough, becoming very rough or high.
Weather
In south, showers . In north, squally showers.
Visibility
In south, good occasionally poor. In north, good occasionally poor.
